Package uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.Exceptions

This package contains exceptions used by the data layer We wrap most exceptions such as SQLException generated by the package internals so as not to expose the internal workings of the classes.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationException
    Exception indicating invalid/inconsistent configuration parameters
    DataFault
    Exception wrapping a fail from the underlying database
    DataNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a query Fails to find a matching BasicDataObject
    MultipleResultException
    Exception thrown when a query finds multiple results in a context where on a single result is expected
    NoTableException
    Exception thrown when the specified table does not exist yet
    UnsupportedException
    Varient of DataException thrown to indicate an unsupported operation in the data layer
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    DataError
    A Data error similar to a DataException but this is taken to be a non recoverable error.
    IndexedError
    Illegal index value

Package uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.Exceptions Description

This package contains exceptions used by the data layer

We wrap most exceptions such as SQLException generated by the package internals so as not to expose the internal workings of the classes.
